did.unittitle: Ansel and Idelle Van Buren bond
did.abstract: One 1891 bond of Ansel and Idelle Van Buren of $21,000 to Henry Lankenau. Ansel Hayes Van Buren and Idelle Newell, a married couple, lived in Flatbush, Brooklyn.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single document.

bioghist.head: Biographical note
bioghist.p: Ansel Hayes Van Buren (1846-1910) married Idelle Newell on November 11, 1884. Ansel was an acomplished musician and salesman with various piano houses in Brooklyn. He and Idelle lived in the Brooklyn neighborhood of Flatbush.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Ansel and Idelle Van Buren bond, 1891, 1977.557, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Bond of Ansel and Idelle Van Buren of $21,000 to Henry Lankenau. Signed by a Kings County notary public and dated 1891.
